## API

### props

| props             | type             | required | default       | description                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| ----------------- | ---------------- | -------- | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| position          | `String`         |          | `"top-right"` |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| compact           | `Boolean`        |          |               | If true force a compact attribution that shows the full attribution on mouse hover, or if false force the full attribution control. The default is a responsive attribution that collapses when the map is less than 640 pixels wide. |
| customAttribution | `String | Array` |          |               | String or strings to show in addition to any other attributions.                                                                                                                                                                      |
